-- 6. External table for credit_history.csv
IF OBJECT_ID('external_credit_history','U') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE external_credit_history;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE external_credit_history
(
    customer_id VARCHAR(500),
    credit_score VARCHAR(200),
    num_credit_accounts VARCHAR(200),
    total_credit_limit VARCHAR(200),
    credit_utilization VARCHAR(200),
    num_late_payments VARCHAR(200),
    bankruptcies VARCHAR(200)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'credit_history.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = bank_raw_data_adls,
    FILE_FORMAT = fmt_csv
);
GO

INSERT INTO BankCredit.stg_credit_history
SELECT * FROM external_credit_history;
GO

SELECT 'stg_credit_history' AS table_name, COUNT(*) AS rows_loaded FROM BankCredit.stg_credit_history;
GO
